hadiths.text: Uqbah bin 'Amir Al-Juhani said:"There are three times at which the Messenger of Allah forbade us to pray or to bury our dead: When the sun has risen fully until it is higher, when it reaches its zenith until it has passed the zenith, and when the sun starts to set" (Sahib)

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّاعَاتِ الَّتِي نُهِيَ عَنْ إِقْبَارِ الْمَوْتَى، فِيهِنَّ
chapter.eng-name: The Times During Which It Is Prohibited To Bury The Dead
